item.description:
come on folks. get out there and meet new people and make new friends.
if you are looking to network with people in boston area, this is the party to go to.

OM is pretty good and you have space to dance if you like.

Description:
Start your weekend right by coming out to NetSAP Boston's February Happy Hour Event at OM Restaurant and Lounge in Harvard Square.

Network with new people, reconnect with friends and be social in the ultra-chic atmosphere of this trendy restaurant and lounge which has made the "Hot List" of Conde Nast Traveller magazine as a place to see.

OM Restaurant and Lounge is located in Harvard Square at 92 Winthrop St in Cambridge. It is accessible via public transportation via the Redline MBTA line at Harvard Square Stop.

For more information on the venue, please click on the following link:

http://www.omrestaura...
item.name: Desi (netsap) cocktail party at OM lounge
